body: *** Set the transaction flag to yes if dmbuilder should log an error before exiting on encountering a cancel state
*** Set the transaction flag to yes if dmbuilder should log an error before exiting on encountering a cancel state
***	- If reload filename, filename is the task name to goto on cancel
***	- If NO reload filename, dmbuilder will move to next task on cancel
EXT Extract Sql (gets only 1 row - field count should be equal to the number of values in the LOA)

***EPM Number of Milliseconds to wait before re-running the SQL (default = 10000)
***LPM Number of times to try before generating an error (defaults to 0 = unlimited tries)
